scripts.cleanBuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.reset: npm run deepClean && npm install --no-fund --no-audit && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.deepClean: npx rimraf package.json.backup package-lock.json npm-shrinkwrap.json build node_modules
scripts.deepCleanRebuild: npm run deepClean && npm install && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.updateDependencies: npx npm-check-updates -u && npm install & npm run cleanBuild
scripts.runMeBeforePublish: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run cleanBuild && npm pkg delete devDependencies scripts && npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json npm-shrinkwrap.json && npm install --no-fund --no-audit --omit=dev && npm shrinkwrap --omit=dev
scripts.npmPack: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnly && npm pack && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npm run reset
scripts.npmPublishTagDev: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish --tag dev && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npm run reset
scripts.npmPublishTagEdge: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish --tag edge && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npm run reset
scripts.npmPublishTagLatest: npx shx cp package.json package.json.backup && npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish --tag latest && npx shx cp package.json.backup package.json && npm run reset
scripts.install:all: npm run install:react && npm run install:emotion && npm run install:mui && npm run install:mdi && npm run install:qrcode && npm run install:notistack && npm run install:rjsf && npm run install:typescript && npm run install:vite && npm run install:vitest && npm run install:eslint && npm run install:prettier
scripts.install:react: npm install --save-exact react react-dom react-router react-router-dom && npm install --save-exact --save-dev @types/react @types/react-dom
scripts.install:eslint: npm install --save-exact --save-dev eslint @eslint/js globals eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks typescript-eslint @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser
